titleStmt.title: Otes's letter for the Right Honourable Sir Leoline Jenkins, Knight, His Majesties principal Secretary of State at Whitehall
titleStmt.author: Oates, Titus, 1649-1705.
Jenkins, Leoline, Sir, 1623-1685.

notesStmt.note: On verso: Otes's petition, to the Kings Most Excellent Majesty, and to the Lord's and others of His Majesties most Honble. Privy Council : the humble petition and complaint of Titus Otes.
Reproductions of originals in Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (reel 770) and Bodleian Library (reel 1532).
Formerly Wing O65; entry cancelled in Wing (2nd ed.).
